  1. import json
  2. from django.db import models
  4. from ftp_deploy.utils.core import commits_parser
  5. from .service import Service
  7. class Log(models.Model):
  8. service = models.ForeignKey(Service, blank=True)
  9. payload = models.TextField()
  10. user = models.CharField(max_length=200)
  11. status = models.BooleanField(default=False)
  12. status_message = models.TextField(blank=True)
  13. created = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
  14. skip = models.BooleanField(default=False)
  16. def commits_info(self):
  17. commits = json.loads(self.payload)['commits']
  18. return commits_parser(commits).commits_info()
  20. class Meta:
  21. ordering = ('-created',)
